SEARCH
Package user

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
user.User
user.Person
user.Manager
public class Manager extends Person
The Manager class represents a manager in the MyFoodora system. It extends the Person class and provides methods for managing users and setting service fees.
Author:
Aymane Adib
